24/* Specification. */
25#include "po-error.h"
26
27#include "error.h"
28#include "xerror.h"
29
30
31void (*po_error) (int status, int errnum,
32 const char *format, ...)
33 = error;
34
35void (*po_error_at_line) (int status, int errnum,
36 const char *filename, unsigned int lineno,
37 const char *format, ...)
38 = error_at_line;
39
40void (*po_multiline_warning) (char *prefix, char *message)
41 = multiline_warning;
42void (*po_multiline_error) (char *prefix, char *message)
43 = multiline_error;
